name: The Shweeem Boks Lab
description: The Shweeem Boks Lab is a 3D single player game created with blender 2.79's game engine. You play as a Breen Shweeem character.  The game is about using Bokses to your advantage as you go throughout the game. You can make as many Bokses as you want, but it may cause things to get crowded. The game only has one episode. I may add more depending on the thoughts of players. I hope you like it! - Samuel Mancer
